subject: Investing
title: Stablecoins: Crypto Meets the Dollar
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Stablecoins: Crypto Meets the Dollar.

hook.text: A cryptocurrency that doesn't move in price? Stablecoins hold a steady $1 pegâ€”and they move trillions.

buildup.text: Stablecoins like USDC and USDT are pegged to the US dollar, backed by reserves or algorithms.

discovery.text: They let traders park profits without converting back to fiat, reducing friction and transfer times.

twist.text: Not all stablecoins are equally safe. Algorithmic stablecoins like TerraUSD collapsed spectacularly in 2022.

climax.text: Reserve transparency and regulation determine whether a stablecoin truly holds the value it promises.

punchline.text: Stable in name, but only as safe as the reserves behind it.
